column4: Vulkan Weapon
Unlock a fast shooting, straightforward gatling gun.
Vulkan Damage
Increase the damage of a single Vulkan bullet by one.
Vulkan Projectile Speed
Increase the speed of the Vulkan bullet.
Vulkan Fire Rate
Increase the rate of fire of the Vulkan.
Vulkan Shot Amount
Increase the amount shot by the Vulkan by one.
Vulkan Pierce
Increase the amount of times the Vulkan can pierce by one.
Missile Weapon
Unlock a missile weapon that will launch from above and below the ship.
Missile Damage
Increase the damage done by the explosion of a missile.
Missile Projectile Speed
Increase the speed of the missile projectile.
Missile Fire Rate
Increase the rate of fire of missiles.
Missile Shot Amount
Increase the amount of missiles fired by one.
Missile Size
Increase the size of the explosion made by missiles.
Plasma Ball Weapon
Unlock a plasma weapon that will slowly travel in a straight line and doing constant damage to anything it touches.
Plasma Damage
Increase the damage done by the plasma ball.
Plasma Fire Rate
Increase the rate of fire of plasma balls.
Plasma Size
Increase the size of the plasma ball.
Options
Unlock an additional, smaller ship that will follow you and shoot diagonally.
Option Damage
Increase the damage done by options.
Option Bullet Speed
Increase the speed of the bullets that options shoot.
Option Fire Rate
Increase the rate of fire of options.
Option Amount
Add another option to follow you.
Focus
Unlocks the use of focus with the right trigger which will slow down the ship to make small, accurate movements easier.
Movement Speed
Increase the base movement speed of the ship
Shields
Add a shield which will take a hit instead of the ship.
